subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Olympic Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James, Dwyane Wade and Carmelo Anthony, who were witnesses to USA Basketball’s meltdown in Athens, will be the linchpins of the team this year.
snippet: LeBron James, Dwyane Wade and Carmelo Anthony, who were witnesses to USA Basketball’s meltdown in Athens, will be the linchpins of the team this year.
